sentences.en: All the criminals got shot in the crossfire.
sentences.cn: 在交火中罪犯全部被击中.

sentences.en: All three criminals got shot in the crossfire.
sentences.cn: 在交火时三名罪犯被击中.

sentences.en: Any civilians killed – including the Chinese – were in the crossfire, he said.
sentences.cn: 他表示,包括那些中国人在内,所有平民伤亡都是在交火中发生的.

sentences.en: Doctors who tried to help the wounded were caught in the crossfire .
sentences.cn: 试图去帮助伤员的医生遭遇了交叉火力。

sentences.en: Hoare managed to negotiate a ceasefire before the aircraft and passengers were caught in the crossfire.
sentences.cn: 霍尔通过谈判在飞机和乘客陷入交火前达成了停火协议.

sentences.en: In some cases, the civilians are killed in the crossfire.
sentences.cn: 但在某些案例中, 这些平民经常在双方交火时遇害.

sentences.en: The child was standing in the middle of the crossfire, defenselessly.
sentences.cn: 这个孩子站在交叉火力之中, 毫无防备.

sentences.en: The doctor was killed in crossfire as he went to help the wounded.
sentences.cn: 那位医生去救助伤员时在交叉火力中丧生。

sentences.en: The leading companies recoiled from the murderous crossfire from the pillboxes.
sentences.cn: 先头部队受到掩体中交叉火力的攻击而撤退.

sentences.en: The officer responded to what he thought was an accident but was suddenly caught in crossfire.
sentences.cn: 这名警官表示:他本以为这是一次意外,却不料突然被交叉火力击中.

sentences.en: When two industrial giants clash, small companies can get caught in the crossfire.
sentences.cn: 两大工业企业争斗之下, 小公司遭受池鱼之殃.

trans.tran_cn: 交叉火力，来自多方面的攻击，卷入两者的争执中并因此遭殃，（可能偶然影响未直接参与者的）激烈言行
trans.tran_en: bullets from two or more opposite directions that pass through the same area
